title: My Billionaire Grump
description: When Lucy planned a summer trip to Florence, she didn’t expect to have to go single. Or for the hotel manager to cheat her out of her river-view room. And especially not for a broody, handsome stranger to offer to swap rooms with her.Offer is a euphemism . The mysterious George Emerson sort of brutalizes her into accepting the exchange. His gesture is as kind as the tone in which he poses it is barbaric, leaving Lucy rightfully confused.What is it about this man that makes her heart race while simultaneously making her want to punch him in the face?Only an unforgettable vacation under the Tuscan sun will unravel Lucy’s true feelings.An enemies to lovers, grumpy sunshine rom-com.
author: Camilla Isley
